danfulea.math.numerical

Class PartialDiffEq

  • java.lang.Object
    • danfulea.math.numerical.PartialDiffEq

  • public class PartialDiffEq
extends java.lang.Object
    Partial diff eq. Based on literature, including Numerical Recipes in C (Cambridge Univ.).
    Author:
    Dan Fulea, 28 OCT. 2006

      Successive overrelaxation solution for general 2nd order elliptic equation in x and y with Chebyshev acceleration.

    • Method Detail

      • sor

        public static void sor(double[][] a,
                       double[][] b,
                       double[][] c,
                       double[][] d,
                       double[][] e,
                       double[][] f,
                       double[][] u,
                       int jmax,
                       double rjac)
        Successive overrelaxation solution for general 2nd order elliptic equation in x and y with Chebyshev acceleration. a, b, c, d, e, and f are input as the coefficients of the equation, each dimensioned to the grid [1..jmax][1..jmax]. u is input as the initial guess to the solution, usually zero, and returns with the final value. rjac is input as the spectral radius of the Jacobi iteration, or an estimate of it.
        Parameters:
        a - a
        b - b
        c - c
        d - d
        e - e
        f - f
        u - u
        jmax - jmax
        rjac - rjac
